package.description:
comp_ehow
Prolog routines for interfacing the ehow.com import functions
For proper functioning, the Cyc ontology (opencyc.org or better researchcyc.org) has to be installed and must be running, and WordNet 2.0 (!!, wordnet.princeton.edu) needs to be installed at a location specified in the WNHOME environment variable.
